SEARCH
Package ca.jolt.server.config

Class ServerConfig

java.lang.Object
ca.jolt.server.config.ServerConfig
public class ServerConfig extends Object
Represents the configuration settings for the server.

This class encapsulates server-related settings such as port numbers, SSL configuration, thread pool settings, application name, and multipart file upload limits. It uses a builder pattern for construction and provides a factory method to create instances from a Properties object with default values if properties are not specified.

    • fromProperties

      public static ServerConfig fromProperties(Properties props)
      Creates a ServerConfig instance from a properties object.

      Retrieves server settings from the provided Properties object using specific keys (e.g., server.port, server.ssl.enabled). If a property is not found or cannot be parsed, the corresponding default value is used (e.g., 8080, false).

      Parameters:
      props - The Properties object containing server configuration settings.
      Returns:
      A new ServerConfig instance with the loaded settings.
